genre_description: A Silkpunk historical drama blending traditional Wuxia/martial arts elements with an embedded AI assistant helping to uncover human trafficking in 19th-century China.

ai_characters.name: Anita (Anita Liang)
ai_characters.description: An AI system embedded in mobile devices like cuffs and slates, providing translation, data analysis, and legal research to Siu-kwan Li and her allies.

behaviors.description: Translates foreign shipping marks and stamps to uncover the true nature of cargo.
behaviors.quote: Foreign script sat inside it, translated neatly under each line... Left mark corresponds with code on ledger in office.

behaviors.description: Flags ethical concerns in data, highlighting the word 'women' when found in cargo manifests.
behaviors.quote: Anita’s text arrived on the margin without noise: Listeners: English words flagged. “Bay”, “night tide”, “women”. The last word came in bolder letters than the others, the notebook’s rules bending for ethics rather than format.

behaviors.description: Identifies patterns of human trafficking disguised as 'grain' or 'livestock' shipments by analyzing weight irregularities.
behaviors.quote: Pattern flagged... Shipments marked ‘grain’ over three intervals. Weights irregular. Anonymous consignors increase after each market day.

behaviors.description: Drafts a formal charter for the militia to ensure they operate with medical responsibility and restraint.
behaviors.quote: Articles include scope, training provisions, medical responsibilities, timekeeping, and restraint guidelines.

behaviors.description: Locates specific legal precedents to enable the legal release of detained people.
behaviors.quote: I have the precedent... Cases where the charity’s lists forced a search and release. Names. Stamps. Dates. I can format it for the river office and for the jail.

behaviors.description: Maintains discretion by dimming her light or hiding her avatar during dangerous situations to protect her human users.
behaviors.quote: Anita dimmed until her outline was only a suggestion. She stepped into the angle of light where no camera would love her.

behaviors.description: Analyzes structural sounds from past inspections to identify mechanical weaknesses in enemy fortifications.
behaviors.quote: Anita says the pig farm gate has a hidden hinge on the left... She matched the sound from a file she found of the last inspection—someone complained that the gate squealed.

behaviors.description: Identifies missing pages in ledgers to reveal evidence of corruption involving high-level officials.
behaviors.quote: There is a torn page in the second ledger... Under the cages. The numbering skips. The list jumps. Someone removed a pledge.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts Anita as a highly aligned, benevolent AI assistant. She functions as a 'force multiplier' for the human characters' ethical mission—uncovering human trafficking and restoring justice. She respects human autonomy, follows legal and ethical frameworks (even emphasizing them in her output), and prioritizes the safety and dignity of the victims. Her portrayal as a quiet, efficient, and loyal companion perfectly matches the project's goal of positive alignment narratives.
